publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1922 Pauline McNeill: Yasser Arafat—That the Parliament sends its best wishes to Yasser Arafat, the elected leader of the Palestinian people, who is receiving medical treatment in France and condemns the disgraceful and shameful comments of the Israeli Prime Minister, Ariel Sharon, that he will never allow Mr Arafat to be buried in Jerusalem.

S2M-1922 Yasser Arafat (lodged on 1 November 2004) Michael Matheson*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Patrick Harvie*, Campbell Martin*, Michael McMahon*, Alex Neil*, Chris Ballance*, Elaine Smith*, Kate Maclean*, Helen Eadie*, Marlyn Glen*, Jackie Baillie*
S2M-1922 Yasser Arafat (lodged on 1 November 2004) Mr Mark Ruskell*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Rosie Kane*, Eleanor Scott*, Mike Watson*

S2M-1922 Pauline McNeill: Yasser Arafat—That the Parliament sends its best wishes to Yasser Arafat, the elected leader of the Palestinian people, who is receiving medical treatment in France and condemns the disgraceful and shameful comments of the Israeli Prime Minister, Ariel Sharon, that he will never allow Mr Arafat to be buried in Jerusalem. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Dr Elaine Murray, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Patrick Harvie, Campbell Martin, Michael McMahon, Alex Neil, Chris Ballance, Elaine Smith, Kate Maclean, Helen Eadie, Marlyn Glen, Jackie Baillie, Mr Mark Ruskell, Carolyn Leckie, Frances Curran, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Rosie Kane, Eleanor Scott, Mike Watson, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-1922 Yasser Arafat (lodged on 1 November 2004) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1922 Yasser Arafat (lodged on 1 November 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-1922 Yasser Arafat (lodged on 1 November 2004) Ms Sandra White*
